Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Structural fatigue crack at stress point. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 27/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh
